Interesting & informative lecturer, but not good at communicating - critical information can easily be missed because it's revealed at weird times or with little announcement.
Maybe the fault of the cirriculum, but grading was unclear. Everyone I talked to lost ~25 points on one early assignment due to a rule that we weren't told about beforehand.
I have never had this much fun in a class before. Would highly recommend this course to everyone and taking it with Dr. Murphy is a must!
Only class I've ever taken where I have genuinely wanted to retake the course again just to repeat the course because I enjoyed it that much!
Amazing class, amazing prof, enough said.

Dr. Murphy is always super enthusiastic and clearly loves the material. We did weekly labs in the woods learning hands on material which he was super knowledgeable about and I had a lot of fun taking this course. Super engaging lectures and labs! Would highly recommend him if you have the chance!
This class you do labs outside learning super cool and awesome field techniques. Dr Murphy and the TA were super helpful and very knowledgeable! Favourite class at SFU!
I took 305 with Brendan and it was a great class! The course concepts introduced us to various methods in environmental science, the lectures were engaging, and the labs were fun.
